reviewText: THIS IS A POTTERS HOUSE BIBLE STUDY WHERE BISHOP TALKS ABOUT ABRAHAM,SARAH AND HAGAR AND WE AS CHRISTIANS BEING HEIRS OF THE PROMISE GOD GAVE TO ABRAHAM AND HOW TO ATTAIN THOSE BLESSINGS.  EXPLAINING THEIR SITUATION IN A WAY LIKE NEVER BEFORE BUT VERY INSIGHTFUL. THE BOND WOMAN (HAGAR) AND THE FREE WOMAN (SARAH) AND HOW WE AS BEING FREE ARE INTITLED TO THE PROMISE. A FOUR PART SERIES. ENJOY
